> ::Lord Elder::
> 
> Elder: Can you tell us what these reprecussi=
ons are or 
> must we protect the time space continuem that far?
 
=
Legacy shook his head very slightly, =93DEFEATING THE MINIONS AT THIS JUNCT=
URE HAS AVERTED THE CRITICAL TIME SPACE EVENT. HOWEVER THE CHANCES CONTINUE=
 TO EXIST THAT EITHER THROUGH ACTION OR INACTION ON YOUR PART SOMETHING EQU=
ALLY AS CATASTROPHIC WILL OCCUR AGAIN.=94 
 
Legacy=92s optic blinked =
and dimmed thoughtfully, =93ALREADY YOU HAVE REMAINED ON EARTH LONGER THAN =
YOUR ORIGINAL TENTURE, AND FORMED CITIES WERE THEIR WERE ORIGINALLY NONE. T=
HE LONGER ANY OF YOU REMAIN, THE MORE INDELIBLE YOUR PRINT ON THE EARTH WIL=
L BE. SHOULD THE HUMANS BECOME AWARE OF YOUR PRESENCE BEFORE THEY WERE SUPP=
OSE TO, OR IF THEY ARE DAMAGED IN SOME WAY BY YOUR PRESENCE, THE CHANCES OF=
 CHANGE BECOME LARGER AGAIN.=94
 
> Elder then notices how Legacy i=
s distracted several times.
> 
> Elder: What is it?
 
Legac=
y=92s optic brightens as he believes he has located the source of the senso=
r blip, =93THERE IS SOMETHING ELSE HERE . . .=94 Legacy raised his right ar=
m, and pointed in the direction of Nightstrike=92s hidden location. 
 =

Preston
(Legacy)
